name: net
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool check_username.
Tool description: Generate/Check if a username is available on various platforms like Facebook, instagram, tiktok, snapchat and other social media platforms! You can also check if  a domain is registered or not.
API description: Checks if a .net domain name is registered using the RapidAPI 'check-username' service.

name.description: The .net domain name to check for registration.
